mutants.code:
def is_last_character_one_bit(bits):
    count = 1
    i = len(bits) - 2
    while i >= 0 and bits[i] != 0:
        count += 1
        i -= 1
    return count % 2 == 0

def is_last_character_one_bit(bits):
    count = -1
    i = len(bits) - 2
    while i >= 0 and bits[i] != 0:
        count += 1
        i -= 1
    return count % 2 == 0
